conbody.p: Toggle the IMAGEFRAME system variable to change the visibility and plotting for image frames. You can launch this command at the Command prompt or within another command by preceding it with an apostrophe: 'IMAGEFRAME.

ul.li: 0: sets the IMAGEFRAME system variable to 0.
1: sets the IMAGEFRAME system variable to 1.
2: sets the IMAGEFRAME system variable to 2.
